H0.text: Who was the first man to swim 100 metres in under a minute. Johnny Weissmuller's contemporary, Duke Kahanamoku

H1.text: Who was the first man to swim 100 metres in under a minute. Australian swimmer, Andrew Charlton

H2.text: Who was the first man to swim 100 metres in under a minute. American swimmer, Buster Crabbe

H3.text: Who was the first man to swim 100 metres in under a minute. Weissmuller

A4.text: He was the first man to swim the 100-meter freestyle under one minute.

A5.text: On July 9, 1922, Weissmuller broke Duke Kahanamoku's world record in the 100-meter freestyle, swimming it in 58.6 seconds.
